description: NASA and Smithsonian scientists find that greener trees seen in satellite images may warn of upcoming volcanic eruptions. The change is linked to rising carbon dioxide emissions from magma, which trees absorb and display through greener leaves. This method could enhance early warning systems and improve public safety near active volcanoes.
title: NASA Satellite Detects Tree Leaf Changes as Early Volcano Eruption Warning Signal

description: The Realme GT 7 launch event is set for May 26, 2025. The handset is reported to pack a new design language coupled with top-of-the-line features and specifications. The Realme GT 7 is confirmed to feature the MediaTek Dimensity 9400e chipset, which was unveiled recently. Here’s everything you need to know about the upcoming Realme mobile.
title: Realme GT 7: Launch Date, Expected Price in India, Features, Specifications, and More

description: In a significant step for extragalactic astronomy, researchers from the Russian Academy of Sciences have identified 11 new active galactic nuclei (AGNs) through the ART-XC telescope aboard the Spektr-RG space observatory. These AGNs, classified as Seyfert galaxies, span redshifts from 0.028 to 0.258 and display X-ray luminosities typical for the present cosmic epoch. The discovery adds to the team's earlier identification of over 50 AGNs and several cataclysmic variables. Detailed spectral analysis—such as for SRGA J000132.9+240237—points to strong absorption and torus reflection effects. Continued observations will deepen understanding of AGN physics and evolution in the local universe.
title: Russian Researchers Discover 11 New Active Galactic Nuclei In Spektr-RG X-ray Survey

description: A study led by researchers at Tongji University using NASA's GRACE satellites has observed recent ice gains in Antarctica from 2021 to 2023, mainly due to unusual precipitation. However, the long-term satellite data from 2002 to 2020 shows a significant and accelerating trend of ice loss. However, experts emphasize this short-term gain does not reverse the effects of global warming, as Antarctica continues to be impacted by climate change. This nuanced finding underscores the complexity of global warming’s regional impacts.
title: New Study Reveals Recent Ice Gains in Antarctica, But Long-Term Melting Continues

description: A newly discovered supernova remnant named “Teleios,” meaning “perfect” in Greek, is astonishing scientists with its rare circular symmetry. Detected using data from ASKAP’s Evolutionary Map of the Universe, Teleios (G305.4–2.2) could be located 7,170 or 25,100 light years away. With a steep spectral index and low surface brightness, its origin is likely a Type Ia supernova. However, more high-resolution studies are needed to confirm this. Teleios opens new possibilities in understanding supernova evolution and interstellar medium interactions.
title: Astronomers Discover Teleios, A Supernova Remnant with Perfect Symmetry

description: NASA’s SWOT satellite, in collaboration with CNES, reveals how submesoscale ocean features just a mile wide drive vital vertical circulation. These small currents transport heat, carbon, and nutrients, profoundly influencing marine ecosystems and climate systems. The mission’s high-resolution data is reshaping how scientists model ocean-atmosphere interactions and understand Earth’s changing environment.
title: NASA’s SWOT Satellite Reveals Big Impact of Small Ocean Currents and Waves on Ocean

description: Formerly introduced in the Black Panther: Wakanda Forever, Ironheart will follow the story of Riri Williams, whose invention of the armor is robust since Iron Man. This series will have mysterious events, magical clashes, and some crazy crossovers. The episodes will be aired weekly, while the debut will hit with three episodes. Streaming starts from June 25th, 2025, only on JioHotstar.
title: Ironheart OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Marvel’s Upcoming Mini Series?

description: During a Mars flyby on March 1, 2025, NASA’s Europa Clipper spacecraft captured thermal images with its E-THEMIS infrared imager. The mission team used this opportunity to test key instruments ahead of Clipper’s arrival at Jupiter’s moon Europa in 2030.
title: NASA’s Europa Clipper Captures Stunning Infrared Image of Mars

description: Directed by Julius Onah, Captain America: Brave New World is a Marvel superhero movie that is set to release on digital screens on May 28, 2025. Sam Wilson, the new Captain America, will stop the mastermind from succeeding in his nefarious global plan. Watch on JioHotstar.
title: Captain America: Brave New World OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Marvel Movie Online?

description: Written and directed by M.A. Nishad, Iyer in Arabia is an epic Malayalam comedy drama movie that revolves around a traditional Brahmin orthodox family whose son falls in love with a girl from another religion. As his father decides to visit the Middle East to end his relationship, he is challenged by a transformed culture and beliefs. Watch this film only on SunNXT from May 16th, 2025.
title: Iyer in Arabia Now Streaming on SunNXT: What You Need to Know About Shine Tom Chacko, Arfaz Iqbal Starrer Malayalam Comedy Film

description: Sharwanand and Krithi Shetty starrer Manamey, a heartwarming Telugu family drama, is now available in Tamil on Aha from May 16, 2025. Directed by Sriram Adittya, the film explores unexpected parenthood, emotional bonding, and personal growth. Viewers can now enjoy its touching storyline in their regional language.
title: Manamey Tamil Version Now Streaming on Aha: Everything You Need to Know
